title: Keisuke Osako
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> currently playing as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> for <a href="Sanfrecce%20Hiroshima">Sanfrecce Hiroshima</a> of <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a>.
International career.
On May 24, 2019, Osako was called up by <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japan</a>'s head coach <a href="Hajime%20Moriyasu">Hajime Moriyasu</a> to feature in the <a href="2019%20Copa%20Am%C3%A9rica">Copa América</a> played in Brazil. He made his debut on 17 June 2019 in the opening game of Copa against Chile, as a starter.
